Ninjutsu {2}{R}{W}
Haste, reach
[i]Nabata Kunai[/i] – When Igrene, Ninja of Nabata, enters, you may have target creature deal damage to itself equal to its power.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Igrene deals combat damage to a player, you may exile her. If you do, you may cast from exile without paying her mana costs for as long as she remains exiled.
